movies.title: The Shawshank Redemption
movies.description: Andy Dufresne, wrongly convicted of murder, ends up in Shawshank prison. There he finds friendship, meaning in life, and a way to gain freedom.

movies.title: The Godfather
movies.description: The story of the Corleone family, one of the most powerful Mafia organizations in the US.

movies.title: The Dark Knight
movies.description: Bruce Wayne faces a new challenge - The Joker, who seeks to plunge Gotham into chaos.

movies.title: 12 Angry Men
movies.description: 12 jurors must reach a unanimous verdict on the fate of a young man accused of murder.

movies.title: Schindler's List
movies.description: The story of Oskar Schindler, who saved the lives of thousands of Jews during the Holocaust.

movies.title: Pulp Fiction
movies.description: The lives of two mob hitmen, a boxer, a gangster's wife, and a pair of diner bandits intertwine in four tales of violence and redemption.

movies.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King
movies.description: Gandalf and Aragorn lead the World of Men against Sauron's army to draw his gaze from Frodo and Sam as they approach Mount Doom with the One Ring.

movies.title: Forrest Gump
movies.description: The presidencies of Kennedy and Johnson, the Vietnam War, the Watergate scandal, and other historical events unfold from the perspective of an Alabama man with an IQ of 75, whose only desire is to be reunited with his childhood sweetheart.

movies.title: Fight Club
movies.description: An insomniac office worker and a devil-may-care soapmaker form an underground fight club that evolves into something much, much more.

movies.title: Inception
movies.description: A thief who enters the dreams of others to steal secrets from their subconscious must plant an idea into his target's mind.

movies.title: The Matrix
movies.description: A computer hacker learns from mysterious rebels about the true nature of his reality and his role in the war against its controllers.

movies.title: Goodfellas
movies.description: The story of Henry Hill and his life in the mob, covering his relationship with his wife Karen Hill and his mob partners Jimmy Conway and Tommy DeVito in the Italian-American crime syndicate.

movies.title: eg`rhs`w
movies.description: While Frodo and Sam edge closer to Mordor with the help of the shifty Gollum, the divided fellowship makes a stand against Sauron's new ally, Saruman, and his hordes of Isengard.
movies.actors: John Travolta, Uma Thurman, Samuel L. Jackson

movies.title: The Green Mile
movies.description: The lives of guards on Death Row are affected by one of their charges: a black man accused of child murder and rape, yet who has a mysterious gift.

movies.title: tdhe`rh
movies.actors: John Travolta, Uma Thurman, Samuel L. Jackson
